examples.example: 快要考试了，同学们都在认真地复习，争取考出好成绩。

translate.english: The exam is approaching, and students are all seriously reviewing to strive for good grades.

examples.example: 每次考试前，我都会认真地进行复习，以便更好地应对挑战。

translate.english: Before each exam, I will review carefully in order to better deal with the challenges.

examples.example: 每次复习的时候，我都感觉自己在知识的海洋中畅游，不断充实和提升自己。

translate.english: Every time when I review, I feel that I am swimming freely in the ocean of knowledge, constantly enriching and improving myself.
